short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and minimal extension that enables you to edit the source code of any website and save it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: sourceditor is a simple way to edit any website's source code and save it. The next time you visit a site you edited, the changes will still be there.
